metadata.title: CVE-2018-16981 on Ubuntu 22.04 ESM (jammy) - medium
metadata.description: stb stb_image.h 2.19, as used in catimg, Emscripten, and other products,has a heap-based buffer overflow in the stbi__out_gif_code function.

criterions.comment: libsixel package in esm-apps/jammy is affected and may need fixing.
love package in esm-apps/jammy is affected and may need fixing.
